description:
A poor woman steals rice to help a priest in need. A dancing man faces a trickster fox.  A lonely man marries a woman who is actually an icicle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taishiko Dango / Odori Yohei to Yomenashi Gitsune / Kanekkoori Nyoubou
The Taishiko Dumpling / Dancing Yohei and the Brideless Fox / The Kanekkoori Wife
たいしこ団子 / おどり与平とよめなしギツネ / かねっこおり女房
